QuestData.Title: No One Here Gets Out Alive
QuestData.Description: This farm is under lockdown! Nothing gets in and nothing gets out! We're still assessing the situation to try and figure out exactly what happened, but my theory is that the laborers ate the mushrooms and somehow mutated into hideous undead monsters. I mean, how else could this have happened? This is just a farm! We grow mushrooms here! And sludge! Yes, sludge!$B$BTake a look around, $c, because now that you're here you can't leave until this issue is resolved.$B$BSee for yourself!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Assess the situation at the Sludge Fields.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assess the situation at the Sludge Fields.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Warden Stillwater at the Sludge Fields in Hillsbrad Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: As you can see, they're all monsters! Most of my guards died and the ones that managed to escape are now holding down the barricades, preventing any of these potentially dangerous creatures from getting out.$B$BWe need your help!
